title: North Carolina: Sophisticated Downtown Asheville City Break Overlooking Blue Ridge Ranges
description: Cradled by the spellbindingly blue Appalachians and positioned in the heart of North Carolina’s most breathtaking creative city, Kimpton Hotel Arras, an IHG Hotel offers guests a unique chance to experience Asheville’s signature hospitality. Spend your days exploring the "Paris of the South" - hike the Blue Ridges or sip your way across countless microbreweries - and return to laidback Mediterranean-inspired plates at Bargelo and masterfully prepared artisanal cocktails at District 42.
location_description: Kimpton Hotel Arras, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 7 Patton Avenue, Asheville, North Carolina, NC 28801, United States

title: North Carolina Heritage Mountainside Retreat with Championship Golf Course & Subterranean Spa
description:
Discover Asheville's best from this historic stay overlooking the Blue Ridge Mountains. This century-old resort is a haven of North Carolina hospitality, offering locally sourced cuisine at the upscale Vue 1913, craft cocktails at the rustic Great Hall Bar and a Donald Ross-designed championship golf course.

Omni Grove Park Inn makes relaxation easy: enjoy time spent at the 43,000-square-foot subterranean The Spa, featuring eucalyptus steam rooms, therapeutic waterfalls and an oversized, mountain view hot tub.
offer_address: 290 Macon Avenue, Asheville, North Carolina 28804, USA
